attributes.action: treat IP monopolies with respect to fundamental justification not obsolete practice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A monopoly of production and distribution for Intellectual Property in the information age is as outdated as a monopoly on mail in the age of email.
The principle that creativity needs to be rewarded remains valid but needs new expression through digital security structures. Established practice is no more than an expedient to respect fundamental principles and need not be considered essential to the implementation of those principles.
